components.description:
A deer, a fleet-footed, hoofed mammal whose males (bucks, stags) generally have antlers. Variously depicted as a light-brown deer in full profile on all fours facing left or as a deer face looking straight head; both depictions feature large, branched antlers.

May be used to represent elk, moose, antelope, or reindeer, especially in connection with Christmas. Most platforms display a deer in full profile. Twitter shows a deer face.

Google’s deer previously had a red nose, as Rudolph the Red-nosed Reindeer. Apple and WhatsApp’s deers are white-tailed.
components.title: Deer

title: Deer

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Animal symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Deer was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy ?? New inÂ iOS 10.2 http://emojipedia.org/deer/
emoji_net_data.name: deer

bn:00017393n: The common name for 41 species of even-toed ungulates that compose the family Cervidae in the order Artiodactyla; males have antlers.
Deer are the ruminant mammals forming the family Cervidae.
Any animal (such as the deer) of the family Cervidae.
Distinguished from Bovidae by the male's having solid deciduous antlers
A ruminant mammal with antlers and hooves of the family Cervidae or one of several similar animals from related families of the order Artiodactyla

apple_vendor_description: The deer emoji on Apple devices is a graceful woodland creature, rendered with Appleâ€™s characteristic attention to detail and lifelike textures. Its warm, earthy brown coat is enhanced by subtle highlights and shadows, giving it a pleasingly 3D appearance, while its gentle eyes and delicate antlers are depicted with soft rounded edges. This emoji evokes a sense of nature, tranquility, and quiet beauty, often used to symbolize the wilderness, a peaceful moment, or a connection to the natural world in digital communication.
